entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
